bug.author: qianyizh
bug.summary: Travis CI is not consistent with install script
bug.description:
The root cause is this commit. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-isl/Open3D/commit/3b419ca35d873f60d7f84b9ec577164ad01ac012>3b419ca</denchmark-link>
This needs to be reverted.

comments.comment:
This commit is broken too: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-isl/Open3D/commit/dd0988673558cf7933abbed13dda264465907e10>dd09886</denchmark-link>
It should be reverted after the previous (install dependencies). Actually we should have multiple CIs to test different versions of Ubuntu, install from dep and build from source.
